channel.title: GBC ROM Hacker
channel.description:
I just recently started coding VB again today, with no knowledge on hacking ROMs. So I decided to get more into it, with VB experts on IRC to gimme help when I need it. I tried it before with a Get, but I really didn't know what I was doing. Now, I'm gonna easily make a program that edits the characters available in the 'Secrets' tab in Zelda OoA and OoS. I found the offsets for it, which are &H90, &HA8, &HC0, and &HD8.
Anyways, I wanted to release it open-source, so maybe some people could learn from it cause it's really basic.
[URL=http://www.mediafire.com/?d2wzvjy2wbl]Download[/URL]
If you get an error saying it can't find the component COMDLG32.OCX or DLL, just Google it and download it + place it in the folder, or goto Start > "regsvr32 COMDLG32.OCX/DLL" no quotes or / with only OCX or DLL.
I don't care whether it's bad or good, just felt like released :)
~Lin

item.title: GBC ROM Hacker
item.dc:creator: @JukuG JukuG
item.description:
@JukuG wrote:

[quote=“Lin, post:3, topic:173232”]Hehe, this is way outdated. I made 2 more ROM hackers. I made it so this one can convert to ASCII, ASCII to byte, and it’s a lot better; we’ll say that. I thought about re-adding it, but I was way to lazy. I might make a tutorial on making a ROM hacker, whether it’s loading multiple bytes. It’s easy, but it takes a long time. I feel ashamed of this old version xD

EDIT: I might make a tutorial, but posting it on this site will be like 1 to 1000, because everyone here treats other like shit.[/quote]

lol, how true is that last part?

Read full topic

item.description:
@Lin wrote:

Hehe, this is way outdated. I made 2 more ROM hackers. I made it so this one can convert to ASCII, ASCII to byte, and it’s a lot better; we’ll say that. I thought about re-adding it, but I was way to lazy. I might make a tutorial on making a ROM hacker, whether it’s loading multiple bytes. It’s easy, but it takes a long time. I feel ashamed of this old version xD

EDIT: I might make a tutorial, but posting it on this site will be like 1 to 1000, because everyone here treats other like shit.

item.title: GBC ROM Hacker
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

I just recently started coding VB again today, with no knowledge on hacking ROMs. So I decided to get more into it, with VB experts on IRC to gimme help when I need it. I tried it before with a Get, but I really didn’t know what I was doing. Now, I’m gonna easily make a program that edits the characters available in the ‘Secrets’ tab in Zelda OoA and OoS. I found the offsets for it, which are &H90, &HA8, &HC0, and &HD8.

Anyways, I wanted to release it open-source, so maybe some people could learn from it cause it’s really basic.

Download

If you get an error saying it can’t find the component COMDLG32.OCX or DLL, just Google it and download it + place it in the folder, or goto Start > “regsvr32 COMDLG32.OCX/DLL” no quotes or / with only OCX or DLL.

I don’t care whether it’s bad or good, just felt like released

~Lin
